comment: Professor Lee is extremely funny and his lectures are rarely boring. I have the class two nights a week for 2 and a half hours and am never bored. He is lenient on attendance and most often cancels class if he decides that work can be done outside of class. Autocad project takes time and attention to detail but is not ridiculously hard.

He is not a good teacher. He gets lost doing examples therefore I am completely lost. Also, if you are doing lab he is no where to be found. Being fair, it doesnt seem as if he knows what he is talking about.
Very easy-going. A couple of tough assignments, but he'll work with you to make sure it gets done. Flexible with attendance as long as you get your work done. Tries to get everyone an A.
Pretty cool guy, shows a lot of knowledge about auto cad. ASK questions and you will be fine.

Very ... interesting guy. Doesnt really help much if you dont ask questions... but even then he doesnt answer them so clearly. Either way if you put forth some type of effort you should be fine in here.

Great professor! Best class I have taken my last 3 years at SPSU! As long as you put effort into the course you'll get an A! Take surveying in the spring if possible. You only deal with rain, the occasional snow shower and hurricane force winds(you will go outside in these conditions)but at least it's not hot out!
LIVING HISTORY. BEST PROFESSOR ON CAMPUS. COOLEST. I LIKE AUTOCAD NOW, BEFORE I USED TO HATE IT. WOULD TAKE ANY OTHER CLASSES HE DECIDES TO TEACH.

Funny and cool guy, easy A(only gives a A or F) so long as you turn in the work and do the final project(quality of the work doesn't matter). He is more than glad to help in class, but do not expect to get any of the work you do back as he never gave back a single thing even though some of the projects took over 20 hours of work.

He wanted to help you as much as possible. Not always organized. If you go to class and put in an effort, he'll help you the rest of the way. I enjoyed his class a lot. He's funny in a cheesy way too, which I find fun.
Mr. Lee never gave us feedback as to our graeds throughout the entire class. If he doesn't like you, don't expect a decent grade.

Mr. Lee made the class fun. He is pretty funny and jokes around a lot but gets stuff done. Really helps you out if you don't get Auto CAD. Gives you overlapping projects and expects you to finish them on time. The first project takes a long time and needs some work. But if you ask him he will help. Your final project should take at least 50 hours.

Mr. Lee is probably the best teacher I have had so far. He is extremely nice, upbeat, and always willing to help you if you have any questions what so ever. I highly recomend taking Mr. Lee's class because I learned so much just the first couple of days in class. Super awesome teacher, hope to take him again in the future.
Great man, excellent sense of humor. Two thumbs up!

Mr. Lee is always willing to stay and help you learn. If you have never taken an autocad course you may fall behind, but stick with it and lee will help you through it. Make sure you go to class because it can go kinda fast sometimes. Overall great teacher.

His class was great.Would not mind staying after class for hours to make sure you understand how to use AutoCad.He really does care about the student and making sure he/she can learn everything the class has to offer. He really knows his stuff.If you want to learn autocad this is your professor.Highly recommended.Sometimes unclear when ass. are due
Class was fun. He is very helpful and really knows what he's talking about. With his final project, I was able to finish the class a few weeks early too.
Greatest Teacher I've taken at the University! Extremely helpful.  Easy A if you do what he asks!! TAKE HIM!!!

Great teacher. really cool guy, loves to teach. he explains everything very well, and doesn't mind explaining it twice or three times. you must do your projects fully but they are not hard once you undertand AutoCAD. he takes roll, but he's very understanding if you are late, even an hour late.

THis teacher is awesome. If all the teacher were like Mr. Lee I would enjoy classes more. I really looked forward to his class. He has a great attitude and enjoys what he is doing. A good teacher will produce good students.
Awesome teacher with great attitude. Not always easy, but he is one of the most helpful professors I have ever had. HIGHLY recommended.
